Field Label: With the subject standing upright with feet together, arms hanging loosely at sides, and weight evenly distributed, did the examiner take the subject's hospital gown from the back, place it over the shoulder, place the anthropometric tape at the level of the umbilicus, applying the tape snugly but not tightly, making sure the tape was on a horizontal plane and ask the patient to fully relax their shoulders before taking measurement?
What was the average waist measurement?
